name: The Story of Yu
description:
A short experience around the stories of Yu. You have flash backs to your past to help better understand the story of Yu and repair your lost memories.

Global Game Jam: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/story-yu-8

This was made during the 48 Hour 2020 Global Game Jam. Created by myself and my friend (James / Atroxit). All assets apart from sound effects were made during the jam.
